features.name: Unstoppable
features.description: Once per long rest, enter an Unstoppable state with an Unstoppable die (d4 at level 1, d6 at level 5). Start at 1; each time you deal at least 1 HP damage, increase it by 1. When it would exceed its max or the scene ends, the die is removed. While Unstoppable, reduce physical damage severity by one step, add the die value to your damage rolls, and you cannot be Restrained or Vulnerable.

hope_feature.name: Frontline Tank
hope_feature.description: Spend 3 Hope to clear 2 Armor Slots.

features.name: Rally
features.description: Once per session, rally the party to give yourself and each ally a Rally Die (d6 at level 1, d8 at level 5). A PC can spend their Rally Die to add it to an action, reaction, or damage roll, or clear Stress equal to the roll. Unused Rally Dice clear at session end.

hope_feature.name: Make a Scene
hope_feature.description: Spend 3 Hope to temporarily Distract a target within close range, giving them -2 Difficulty.

features.name: Beastform
features.description: Mark a Stress to transform into a Beastform of your tier or lower. While transformed, you cannot use weapons or domain spells, but other features still apply. Ongoing spells remain active. You gain the form's features, add its Evasion bonus, and use its listed trait for attacks. Armor slots remain marked through the change; if you mark your last HP, you drop out of the form.

features.name: Wildtouch
features.description: You can perform subtle, harmless nature effects at will, such as coaxing growth, summoning a breeze, or starting a campfire.

hope_feature.name: Evolution
hope_feature.description: Spend 3 Hope to enter a Beastform without marking Stress. Choose one trait to gain +1 until you leave that form.

features.name: Hunter's Focus
features.description: Spend a Hope to make an attack. On a success, deal normal damage and make the target your Focus. Until the focus ends or you choose another, you know their direction; when you damage them they mark a Stress; and when you miss, you may end the focus to reroll your Duality Dice.

hope_feature.name: Hold Them Off
hope_feature.description: Spend 3 Hope after a successful weapon attack to use the same roll against two additional targets in range.

features.name: Cloaked
features.description: Any time you would be Hidden, you are instead Cloaked. You remain unseen while stationary even if an adversary moves to where they would normally see you. You lose Cloaked after an attack or when you end a move in line of sight.

features.name: Sneak Attack
features.description: When you hit while Cloaked or while an ally is within melee range of your target, add d6s equal to your tier to the damage roll.

hope_feature.name: Rogue's Dodge
hope_feature.description: Spend 3 Hope to gain +2 Evasion until an attack succeeds against you; otherwise it lasts until your next rest.

features.name: Prayer Dice
features.description: At the start of each session, roll d4s equal to your subclass Spellcast trait to form your Prayer Dice. Spend any number to aid yourself or an ally within far range: reduce incoming damage, add to a roll after it is made, or gain Hope equal to the die. Unused dice clear at session end.

hope_feature.name: Life Support
hope_feature.description: Spend 3 Hope to clear 1 Hit Point on an ally within close range.

features.name: Arcane Sense
features.description: You can sense magical creatures and objects within close range.

features.name: Minor Illusion
features.description: Make a Spellcast Roll (10). On a success, create a minor visual illusion no larger than you within close range; it is convincing to anyone at close range or farther.

features.name: Channel Raw Power
features.description: Once per long rest, move a loadout domain card to your vault to either gain Hope equal to its level or add twice its level to a damage roll for a damaging spell.

hope_feature.name: Volatile Magic
hope_feature.description: Spend 3 Hope to reroll any number of damage dice on a magic-damage attack.

features.name: Parting Strike
features.description: When an adversary within melee range tries to leave, make a reaction roll using any trait against their Difficulty. On a success choose one effect (two on a critical): stop their movement, deal damage equal to your primary weapon, or move with them.

features.name: Combat Training
features.description: Ignore burden when equipping weapons. When you deal physical damage, add your level to the damage roll.

hope_feature.name: No Mercy
hope_feature.description: Spend 3 Hope to gain +1 to attack rolls until your next rest.

features.name: Prestidigitation
features.description: You can perform subtle, harmless magic at will, such as changing colors, creating scents, lighting candles, floating tiny objects, illuminating a room, or repairing a small item.

features.name: Strange Patterns
features.description: Choose a number from 1-12. When you roll it on a Duality Die, gain a Hope or clear a Stress. You can change the number on a long rest.

hope_feature.name: Not This Time
hope_feature.description: Spend 3 Hope to force an adversary within far range to reroll an attack or damage roll.
